attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish it to be known that we the people of this ONCE great nation are fed up with our national pride, traditions and all that was ONCE great, being belittled by  faceless left wing do gooders. We are British and proud, and will not accept our Union flag, National anthem or proud history from being erased!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
